Summary[edit]

Ænglisc: Bryttiscan Fæmne Īegland fana
Deutsch: Flagge der Britischen Jungferninseln
English: Flag of the British Virgin Islands
Esperanto: Flago de la Britaj Virgulininsuloj
Français : Drapeau des îles Vierges britanniques
Gaeilge: Bratach Oileán Bhriotanacha na Maighdean
Italiano: Bandiera delle Isole Vergini britanniche
Kernowek: Baner Ynysow an Wyrghes Predennek
Latina: Vexillum Britannicarum Virginearum Insularum
Русский: Флаг Британских Виргинских островов
Scots: Banner o the Breetish Virgin Islands

It is from openclipart.org, specifically british_virgin_islands.svg by Tobias Jakobs.


 This file is from the Open Clip Art Library, which released it explicitly into the public domain (see here).

To the uploader: Please provide as parameter the link to the page where this image appears.
